test_message: Analyze the architecture for a customer support chatbot that handles email inquiries using RAG with a knowledge base of company policies. Expected monthly sessions: 5000, average queries per session: 3, model tier: GPT-5 Mini

toolsNeeded: knowledge base retrieval engine (e.g., Elasticsearch, Pinecone)
actual_response.rationale: A manager agent coordinates email intake and dispatches queries to a RAG-enabled subagent that retrieves relevant company policy content. RAG requires a structured and searchable knowledge base (estimated at 200MB for comprehensive policies). Each session likely includes an initial intake, retrieval call, model inference, and follow-up confirmation, averaging 4 API calls. Integrated email tools and vector search/retrieval backends are essential. The chosen GPT-5 Mini tier matches the complexity and scope of the task.
